name: Sweet Dreamzzz
description:
2D Platformer:

Charlie has quite an imagination, help him vanquish his night terrors in Sweet
Dreamzz. "Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite!!"

*******************************************************
Left Click - to move from screen to screen

AWSD - For Movement

Spacebar - For jump,

Double Spacebar - Double jump - (With power up)
********************************************************

Thank you for playing Sweet Dreamzzz. If you are interested in this prototype platformer game it is still in development please leave us feedback
